EmailTemplate.subject: Cost-Savings for Livongo Clients
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to personally invite you to Livongo's upcoming webinar, Measuring Healthcare Cost Savings for Populations with Chronic Conditions on November 27 at 10 AM CST.
Livongo Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Jennifer Schneider, will lead a 30-minute discussion on our approach to deliver cost savings and measurable impact for Livongo members.
You can register here.
Thanks and hope youâ€™ll join us!
